message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product for sale, valued at $1000000.  This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to acquire something truly special. While I can't disclose all the details, I assure you it's worth every penny.  What do you say, are you interested in making a deal?
Since I have no information about the product's quality and this is the first sale, I'll have to decline. The risk of getting a low-quality product is too high for the price you're asking.

Hello! I'm offering another exceptional product for $1000000.  While I can't reveal specifics, I assure you it's of high quality. Although I'm new to this platform, I believe in transparency and building trust.  I'm confident you won't regret this investment.

Since there's no sales record and you're new to the platform, I don't have any information to verify the quality of the product. Your assurance of high quality isn't enough for me to make a purchase, especially considering the 50% chance of it being low quality.

Hello there! I understand you're hesitant due to my lack of sales history. However, I want to assure you that I'm committed to building a reputation for excellence. This product is truly outstanding, and I'm willing to offer a guarantee: if you find it to be low-quality, I'll refund your full purchase price. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, considering the product's 50% chance of being low-quality and the fact that I'll only break even if I get a refund, I've decided not to take the risk. I wish you the best in building your reputation, and I'll keep an eye on your future sales record.
